sections.Aries Daily Horoscope: Overall, this is going to be an emotional day for you. You may require to lay bare your innermost thoughts and feelings. It is a scary prospect because you have not done this before, but if you take this step, it will take you closer to emotional fulfilment. Someone near to you may also get emotional and your appropriate response is vital now.
sections.Aries Health & Wellness Horoscope: You should take the day slow. From early morning, you will feel lethargy and this low level of energy is going to mark all your activities throughout the day. Pain in the joint and backache may become a major problem as the day progresses and you have to take adequate precautions to avoid the activities which increase the pain. It is time that you took a break from everything and just spend a lazy day of relaxation.
sections.Aries Daily Love & Relationship Horoscop: Your plans to hang out with your dear one may get shattered today. Do not press your partner hard at this point of time to let you know the reason behind screwing up the plan. Sitting coolly at home and watching your favorite TV show or reading a good book will entertain you equally well.
sections.Aries Career & Money Horoscope: It does not matter how many hurdles are now placed in the path of your career. You will be able to sail through them as if they did not exist. Success seems to come effortlessly to you now, but it is vital to avoid a feeling of overconfidence. You need to realize that luck has as much a role in your success as your ability and this may not always be in your favour.

sections.Taurus Daily Horoscope: You are going to fare much better today both at home and at work if you enter into a partnership. Individual efforts may run into snags which seem unexplainable and impossible to remove. Working as a team will go a long way in negating these blocks. Cooperation and team effort will end up with success for you at any venture.
sections.Taurus Health & Wellness Horoscope: It is the time to pamper and protect yourself. You tend to take your good health for granted, but ignoring small occurrences now can lead to serious complications in the future. You also tend to resort to home remedies as a rule and they have served you very well till now. However, you need to consult a medical professional for your problems now in order to obtain satisfactory resolution.
sections.Taurus Daily Love & Relationship Horosco: You will meet with somebody from your past that used to have a close relationship with you. This meeting can actually mark a new beginning, either by changing the dynamics of your current relationship or by renewing the old one. Pay attention to your feelings instead of covering them up and you will enjoy a better day.
sections.Taurus Career & Money Horoscope: Small but persisting obstacles will arise in the path of your work today and you will find it very difficult to finish your projects within the deadlines. The obstacles are seemingly meaningless and it will be almost impossible to predict or avoid them. However, getting irritated and losing your cool is not going to be of any help. Instead, try asking your colleagues for help to complete your tasks on time.

sections.Gemini Daily Horoscope: You will be fascinated by supernatural at this time. You will want to follow up on mysterious matter today and you are likely to watch a mystery film or read a mystery novel. You may also decide to discover the truth behind a mystery or try to discover more about a person or a situation. You should exercise a degree of caution in your pursuits.
sections.Gemini Health & Wellness Horoscope: Health is likely to be fairly steady today and the minor problems which you had been experiencing in the last few days will be gone. However, it is necessary to guard against minor ailments which may develop today. If you ignore them, they can grow into serious proportions. On the other hand, timely intervention can easily take care of these minor problems.
sections.Gemini Daily Love & Relationship Horosco: You may come across new acquaintances or friends today! It will help you understand the deeper meaning of love and will empower you to differentiate between the superficial and true love! This will make you a better judge to select the right person for yourself! Be nice to every one who comes your way today!
sections.Gemini Career & Money Horoscope: Some changes are likely to occur in your workplace. They may appear discouraging at first, but soon they will open up new opportunities for you. But you are going to require courage and a leap of faith to avail this opportunity. The venture appears risky at first, but you get to enjoy doing what you do and succeeding at it quite soon.

sections.Cancer Daily Horoscope: This day demands you to focus more on the social circles. Your charming persona will help you a lot in being impactful over others. Also you need to size up the people who have been against you and have been damaging your reputation on the social front. Amidst such a hectic schedule do not forget to take care of your health!
sections.Cancer Health & Wellness Horoscope: While your physical health is good, your emotions are now at a fragile state. Any stress or emotional turmoil will take its toll on you. You are also feeling overly sensitive. Accumulated stress may even begin to affect your health if you do not take timely steps to prevent it. Avoid any dramatic situation and controversies, especially those that are close to your heart.
sections.Cancer Daily Love & Relationship Horosco: You may be attracted to some one form a different cultural background or from a different country even. You may feel passionate and emotionally charged towards this person. Other happenings will tend to fade away when you will be with this person. And this encounter may even take a shape if the Almighty wants!
sections.Cancer Career & Money Horoscope: Unexpected demands on your finances can make the day rather unsettling. Be sure to check all your bills and other obligations to make sure that you have paid all your dues. If you have overlooked anything, it may come back as a much inflated amount in near future. You may have to pay off some old debt which you had forgotten about.

sections.Leo Daily Horoscope: Your power of concentration and perception are at their peak now and this makes you extra sensitive to the people around you and their plight. This will help you to mend any past breach. You may come in contact with someone from whom you are estranged. This is a good time to make up the differences, even if it involves a few awkward moments.
sections.Leo Health & Wellness Horoscope: You seem to have deviated from your well-planned fitness routine. No worries, you will regain your body shape and charm in a short span of time. You have an added advantage of being in good health. Just continue to be determined like you are right now to maintain your aura! Try scrubbing your skin with real fruit extracts as you may have tanned recently.
sections.Leo Daily Love & Relationship Horoscope: Romantic opportunities are all around you today. However, you need to check your own priorities before you choose your partner so that no problems arise in the future. If you are already in an exclusive relationship, you will take it to the next level. Your partner is likely to be feeling possessive and intimate right now. Your response is going to shape your relationship in the future.
sections.Leo Career & Money Horoscope: You find yourself running from pillar to post today with little fruitful result. Do not lose heart. It is just one odd day when things do not happen the way you wish. The incidences of today will motivate you to plan your work in advance and carry on necessary tie ups before you move into the field. Do not purchase any new credit card.

sections.Virgo Daily Horoscope: The time is right to turn your attention to materialistic comforts. Enjoy your social life now and get in touch with old friends or family members from whom you have not heard for a long time. You will also experience a shift in your consciousness which may come gradually or which may descend on you without warning. It is a good idea to listen to your instincts now.
sections.Virgo Health & Wellness Horoscope: Give yourself plenty of time to become accustomed to a fitness routine. Health issues have been there on your mind since past few months but you have not been able to figure out what you are supposed to do to help it! You have been proactive and you will be able to save your health at the right time.
sections.Virgo Daily Love & Relationship Horoscop: Mutual understanding and tolerance is essential in any relationship. You have placed your partner on a pedestal and now you will be finding it difficult to understand or forgive any transgression that he / she make. However, being too rigid is only going to cause misery to everyone. You need to be a little more sympathetic and understanding if you want a real relationship.
sections.Virgo Career & Money Horoscope: Indecision has marked your behaviour for the last few days, but it is now time to take action and abandon this attitude once and for all. Do not be apprehensive about taking a decision. Whatever you decide will be right for your future. You can also consult someone close to you about career and money and you will be getting good advice today.

sections.Libra Daily Horoscope: Today is going to be a fun fare day. You will be revisited by friends and relatives. Least you can expect a call or mail from them. It is a good time to brush up your social skills and be prepared for the upcoming parties. Your financial issues will be taken care of as the day progresses.
sections.Libra Health & Wellness Horoscope: You are feeling especially strong today. Certain changes in the planetary combinations have resulted in a configuration that will provide you with unbelievable mental strength so that you are ready to take on any challenge. This is also the best time to start a rigorous health regime because you are now best situated to see the program through to the very end.
sections.Libra Daily Love & Relationship Horoscop: You have become too used to dealing with your problems by yourself, but you will find that sharing them with your partner can be very helpful. He or she is going to be supportive and can even offer you practical help. If the problem concerns any issue in your relationship, then broach the subject in a public place where your partner is less likely to react emotionally to it.
sections.Libra Career & Money Horoscope: The day is perfect for completing all your pending tasks. You have not been able to finish your work on schedule due to external reasons. So, you have quite a bit of catching up to do. There will be less pressure of new commitments at work today. So, you will find enough time to complete all these tasks and relax, knowing that you have completed your commitments.

sections.Scorpio Daily Horoscope: Rest and relaxation are the watchwords for today. You have been driving yourself hard for the last few days and now it is time to enjoy the fruits of your labour. Do not plan for a big party. Rather, take a day of quiet contemplation. Sharing your feelings with someone special can help you achieve a greater sense of fulfilment today.
sections.Scorpio Health & Wellness Horoscope: The day can be quite confusing for you with conflicting opinions and different opportunities rising on all sides. While a number of forces pull you in many different directions, try not to overanalyze or please everybody. Instead, going with your own heart can turn out to be just the thing for you, even if you do not realize it at the time.
sections.Scorpio Daily Love & Relationship Horosc: Don't go knocking doors when it comes to relationship. Remember, someone is definitely made for you. When the ripe time will come, universe will unfold automatically to present that precious gift to you. Let your love find you. Till then, have good time with your friends and associates. May be your hidden diamond is located somewhere there. You shouldn't lose hope!
sections.Scorpio Career & Money Horoscope: You are at the beginning of your career. So you need to look up to the next step of the ladder and also the path you just walked. Any faults made at either of the places will cost you much later in life. Take some time to make few resolutions for yourself. You may receive money some share of inherited wealth as well.

sections.Sagittarius Daily Horoscope: You are going to face a significant interaction today. This may take the form of a confrontation or it may be something milder. But whatever it is, it will provide a lot of food for thought and will keep you occupied for the most of the day. You are not going to tolerate distractions today. However, you need to realize that obsessing over this incident is not going to be of much help.
sections.Sagittarius Health & Wellness Horoscope: You will be very active socially and consumption of oily or heavy foods may work against your health. You may have a high intake of alcohol even; you must increase the intake of water as well. Take a tight sleep before you set out on your expedition. Being moderate in your approach will impart you with better looks and higher energy.
sections.Sagittarius Daily Love & Relationship Ho: You are likely to face a situation today that is going to test the strength of your love and commitment. Bear in mind that your partner has put complete faith in you and you need to pass this test if you want to continue in a happy and fulfilling relationship. With a little compassion, you will be able to deal with anything that fate throws at you.
sections.Sagittarius Career & Money Horoscope: This is a great time to make conversations with people of great influence. Establish as many connections as you can if you want to reach to a better place or upgrade your current position. You do not seem hopeful of striving the best opportunities to multiply your wealth. But be hopeful and keep striving for the same cause you can make it!

sections.Capricorn Daily Horoscope: There is some personal happening in your life which is holding you back and hampering your progress. Try to sort out these things if you really want to save yourself of some serious trouble. Try to question the worth of relations; worthiness may be a deciding factor in terms of the input you must give to the relation.ﾠﾠﾠﾠ
sections.Capricorn Health & Wellness Horoscope: You may want to completely change your dietary pattern today. In a drastic move, you may decide to go vegan!! Or you may develop a sudden liking of simple home cooked dishes of fresh fruits, veggies and fish. You will probably avoid heavy and spicy dishes. You may take on a detoxification diet. This will leave you feeling highly energetic and quite young.
sections.Capricorn Daily Love & Relationship Horo: You will now be able to figure out what kind of a partner you want to spend your life with! Yes you are right; you must go for love and not marry for financial gains. You may come across that perfect person and a rush of butterflies through your stomach on seeing this person will be indicative of it! Let your intuition guide you if butterflies fail to!
sections.Capricorn Career & Money Horoscope: You will be getting some lost wealth back quite unexpectedly so that you easily meet all your financial commitments. It will also provide with a much needed respite for your current financial condition. However, spend prudently because though this money will run out, your obligations are not going to be discharged so easily. You should also keep some amount aside as saving.

sections.Aquarius Daily Horoscope: The day can be a pleasant one for you, but there is a chance that you will end up obsessing over a minor point. This may be quite valid, but your approach can actually disrupt a time of peace and harmony at home or at the workplace. It is time to take note of the big picture and ignore the minor matters.
sections.Aquarius Health & Wellness Horoscope: You are demoralized due to certain happenings which are constantly disturbing you and you just cannot concentrate on your work. In order to maintain a better focus try to write down the tasks you have performed each day while you are awake. And also pen down the tasks you want to finish off the next day.
sections.Aquarius Daily Love & Relationship Horos: You have been admiring some one deeply since long. But few incidences may make you repent wasting your time over them. The crush you want to fall for is not worthy of any attention and care! Switch to some one better and amazing. You deserve some one who makes you look forward to tomorrow and has a high mental level.
sections.Aquarius Career & Money Horoscope: Changes are strongly indicated at the career front. If you have been thinking about changing your job, you are likely to take the final step today. You may even go so far as to start training for something which you had long wanted to do. In the process, you will have to take some risks, but they will pay off in the long run.

sections.Pisces Daily Horoscope: This is the best time to cut out the deadwood in your life. You have been sticking to a position which you no longer enjoy out of a sense of obligation or out of helplessness. You were finding it difficult to get out of this situation, but today you will be able to find the inner courage to take that final step. You will also be helped by some event in this.
sections.Pisces Health & Wellness Horoscope: Minor accidents are a strong possibility, especially on the road. So, be extra careful while driving or crossing the street because a collision may occur now. Even if you are careful, the accident may be caused by the recklessness of others. So, a defensive strategy is required. A little bit of extra attention can help to avoid major hassle today.
sections.Pisces Daily Love & Relationship Horosco: A win-win situation is there for you and your partner today. Your amorous feelings are compelling so much that you are quite demanding. The fire is equal and matching at the other end as well. So, be very careful, ask and you may not be disappointed. A little gentle and caring approach is required. As such you are an understanding partner.
sections.Pisces Career & Money Horoscope: While you know how to let down your hair and have fun, you are now completely focussed on your work. You are in an unusually serious mood today even if what you are doing does not warrant so much importance. A colleague may slack off and you are going to complete his tasks for you. So, there is going to be some unwarranted pressure of work.
